title: Does thunderlord's decree make Blitz the best supp in the game now?
body: Pull 1 person and its a free kill.

replies.body: I'd recommend taking Bond of Stone over Thurderlord's Decree most games. Bond of Stone is actually broken ATM, 8% damage reduction is so powerful.

10-180 + (0.2 AD and 0.1 AP) every 30 seconds OP.

Feel so strong throwing an auto attack with support Annie then a Q auto W on the enemy ADC in lane for that 50 bonus damage at level 4.

It hell doesn't aye.

I'm not sure if you're being serious but it hell doesn't aye.

It just feels good to be doing bonus damage.

Even if it's like 50.

That's like double my auto damage on a support.

The feels. It's like have double damage in quake, but in league except you are using a silenced USP instead of an AWP like in CS - with which having double damage would be awesome but you're a support and can't afford an AWP so I will take my silenced USP double damage 3rd bullet and be happy with it.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Hell rather be AWPing though, with quad damage every 5 minutes like the mid laners but I guess it does add up. Maybe you're right.
